sentences.english: A little monk who is not old enough to get ordained is called a 'sami. '
sentences.chinese: 小和尚還不到受戒年齡，就叫做“沙彌”。

sentences.english: "As used by the IDF" is a big selling-point, says Mr Shamir.
sentences.chinese: 沙彌爾也說“每年來自國防軍的採購是一個大單。”

sentences.english: A little monk who is not old enough to get ordained is called a  novice monk.
sentences.chinese: 小和尚還不到受戒年齡，就叫做“沙彌”。

sentences.english: Seven years, the so-called law by shramanera precepts plunge in lausanne.
sentences.chinese: 七歲受沙彌戒，法號稱洛桑扎華。

sentences.english: This is novice nun Qin Cheng, Jin Shao to tie dharma affinity with the assembly.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是沙彌尼親乘，近紹來和大家結法緣。

sentences.english: My friend Sammi used to be a total zit face, but now she"s got great skin."
sentences.chinese: 我朋友沙彌以前滿臉豆花，但是她現在皮膚很好。

sentences.english: The mountains are a small temple, the temple has a novice monk.
sentences.chinese: 山上有座小廟，廟裏有個沙彌。

sentences.english: Spontaneously, he used mud to block the lives of water and thus, saved the lives of the ants .
sentences.chinese: 小沙彌急忙用泥土堵住雨水，而救了一羣螞蟻。

sentences.english: He did this so at least the little sami could die in his own parents' home.
sentences.chinese: 他這麼做是讓小沙彌至少可以死在自己家裏。

definition: Buddha Kassapa (Pāli) or Kāśyapa (Skt) (one of the Buddhas of the past)
to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
to pass on doctrines from master to disciple (Buddhism)
the Four Noble Truths (Buddhism)/see also 四諦|四谛[si4 di4] and 苦集滅道|苦集灭道[ku3 ji2 mie4 dao4]
(Buddhism) to initiate sb for monkhood or nunhood
another name for Sakyamuni 釋迦牟尼佛|释迦牟尼佛, the historical Buddha
Prince Ananda, cousin of the Buddha and his closest disciple
name in religion (of Buddhist or Daoist within monastery)
Chinese Buddhist school founded on the Buddhavatamsaka-mahavaipulya Sutra (Garland sutra)
